entry.title: Week in Ethereum News March 18, 2023
entry.summary: Eth News and Links Shapella (Shanghai + Capella) upgrade Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade Layer 1 Client releases Research For Stakers Layer 2 EIPs/Standards This newsletter is made possible thanks to Nexus Mutual What’s so special about Nexus Mutual v2?
